results.title: A Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy
results.brief_description: Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy was a television special featuring the First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy on a tour of the recently renovated White House.

constellations_other.name: Papa-paparazzi
constellations_other.description: Media attention and paparazzi from the assassination of JFK to Lady Gaga's music video.

results.title_for_label: A Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy
results.description: Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy was a television special featuring the First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy on a tour of the recently renovated White House. It was broadcast on Valentine’s Day, February 14, 1962, on both CBS and NBC, and broadcast four days later on ABC. The program was the first ever First Lady televised tour of the White House, and has since been considered the first prime-time documentary specifically designed to appeal to a female audience.
description_for_label: Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy was a television special featuring the First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy on a tour of the recently renovated White House. It was broadcast on Valentine’s Day, February 14, 1962, on both CBS and NBC, and broadcast four days later on ABC. The program was the first ever First Lady televised tour of the White House, and has since been considered the first prime-time documentary specifically designed to appeal to a female audience.

results.title: A Star Is Born
results.brief_description: Bradley Cooper’s directorial debut breathes new life into a classic with his contemporary take on A Star Is Born, featuring a revelatory performance from Lady Gaga and instantly classic musical numbers that was nominated for seven Academy Awards.

constellations_other.name: Sound and Hollywood
constellations_other.description: The impact of sound on Tinsel Town stretches from the beginning of cinema to recent award-winners, as well as the biggest band in K-Pop.

results.description: Seasoned musician Jackson Maine discovers — and falls in love with — struggling artist Ally. She has just about given up on her dream to make it big as a singer — until Jack coaxes her into the spotlight. But even as Ally’s career takes off, the personal side of their relationship is breaking down, as Jack fights an ongoing battle with his own internal demons.

results.title: A Star Is Born
results.brief_description: A movie star helps a young singer/actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

results.title: A Scanner Darkly
results.brief_description: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

results.title: A Royal Night Out
results.creator_credit: SCOPE Pictures, Ecosse Films, Filmgate Films, Kevin Hood, Julian Jarrold, Laurence Dorman, Claire Anderson, Trevor De Silva, Robert Bernstein and Douglas Rae
results.brief_description: The re-imagining of VE Day in 1945, when Princess Elizabeth and her sister, Margaret were allowed out from Buckingham Palace for the night to join in the celebrations, and encounter romance and danger.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.

results.title: A Quiet Place
results.brief_description: A family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.

results.title: A Queer Story
results.brief_description: A drama considering the social implications of being gay in China.

constellations_other.name: Thomas Edison
constellations_other.description: Thomas Edison helped establish cinema as an art-form and mass entertainment. Many of his early films were short and showed everyday activities like riding a bicycle.

results.title: A Private War
results.creator_credit: Kamala Films, Thunder Road, Denver and Delilah Productions, Savvy Media Holdings, Michael O'Connor, Arash Amel, Matthew Heineman, Matthew George, Marissa McMahon, Sophie Becher, Charlize Theron and Basil Iwanyk
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontlines of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

constellations_other.name: Cities under siege
constellations_other.description: The Syrian Civil War is an ongoing conflict that is arguably the most documented in history, with images and videos captured by journalists, activists, combatants and victims.

results.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
results.creator_credit: New Line Cinema, Smart Egg Pictures, Robert Shaye, John Burrows, Sara Risher, Dana Lyman, Gregg Fonseca and Wes Craven
results.brief_description: One, two Freddy’s coming for you. Three, four better lock your doors. Five, six grab a crucifix. Seven, eight better stay up late. Nine, ten never sleep again.

constellations_other.name: Electric Sound Supercut: composers and their distinctive other worlds
constellations_other.description: Electric sound is commonly associated with science fiction narratives for its auditory oddness, which has symbolised other worldly environments, the unconscious and the 1980s.

recommendations.quote: I watched this through a keyhole into the locked TV room where my older siblings watched a bootleg version. When I was caught, the VHS tape was destroyed but the damage was done; I've been an insomniac since.

results.creator_credit_for_label: New Line Cinema, Smart Egg Pictures, Robert Shaye, John Burrows, Sara Risher, Dana Lyman, Gregg Fonseca and Wes Craven
results.description: Teenagers in a small town are dropping like flies, apparently in the grip of mass hysteria causing their suicides. A cop’s daughter, Nancy Thompson, traces the cause to child molester Fred Krueger, who was burned alive by angry parents many years before. Krueger has now come back in the dreams of his killers’ children, claiming their lives as his revenge. Nancy and her boyfriend, Glen, must devise a plan to lure the monster out of the realm of nightmares and into the real world…
description_for_label: Teenagers in a small town are dropping like flies, apparently in the grip of mass hysteria causing their suicides. A cop’s daughter, Nancy Thompson, traces the cause to child molester Fred Krueger, who was burned alive by angry parents many years before. Nancy and her boyfriend, Glen, must devise a plan to lure the monster out of the realm of nightmares and into the real world…

results.title: A Hard Day's Night
results.brief_description: Capturing John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr in their electrifying element, A Hard Day’s Night is a wildly irreverent journey through this pastiche of a day in the life of The Beatles during 1964.

constellations_other.name: Music and fandom
constellations_other.description: Sometimes fans create their own amazing artworks.

results.description: Capturing John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr in their electrifying element, ‘A Hard Day’s Night’ is a wildly irreverent journey through this pastiche of a day in the life of The Beatles during 1964. The band have to use all their guile and wit to avoid the pursuing fans and press to reach their scheduled television performance, in spite of Paul’s troublemaking grandfather and Ringo’s arrest.
description_for_label: Capturing John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr in their electrifying element, ‘A Hard Day’s Night’ is a wildly irreverent journey through this pastiche of a day in the life of The Beatles during 1964.
